com.ic.invisiblecollector

Class CompanyApiFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ic.invisiblecollector.ApiBase
      • com.ic.invisiblecollector.CompanyApiFacade

  • public class CompanyApiFacade
extends com.ic.invisiblecollector.ApiBase
    Immutable and thread safe class for making operations on the /companies API endpoint.

    For object construction see IcApiFacade

    Author:
    ros

        public Company requestCompanyInfo()

        Request the company info from the database.
        Returns:
        up-to-date company info.

      • setCompanyNotifications

        public Company setCompanyNotifications(boolean enableNotifications)
                                throws IcException
        Enable or disable notifications for the company's customer.
        Parameters:
        enableNotifications - true: enable notifications, false: disable notifications
        Returns:
        up-to-date company info.
        Throws:
        IcException - on any general exception

      • updateCompanyInfo

        public Company updateCompanyInfo(Company companyInfo)
                          throws IcException
        Update company info.

        See updateCompanyInfo(Map) for more details.

        Parameters:
        companyInfo - the company info. null values will be discarded.
        Throws:
        IcException

      • updateCompanyInfo

        public Company updateCompanyInfo(java.util.Map<CompanyField,java.lang.Object> companyInfo)
                          throws IcException
        Update company info.

        You should use requestCompanyInfo() before using this method to request company info since the CompanyField.NAME and CompanyField.VAT_NUMBER mandatory company fields cannot be changed and are needed for validation and consistency purposes.

        Parameters:
        companyInfo - the company info attribute map. null values will not be discarded. See CompanyField.assertCorrectlyInitialized(Map) for a list of the mandatory attributes.
        Returns:
        up-to-date company info
        Throws:
        IcException - on any general exception
        See Also:
        updateCompanyInfo(Company)
